hasMenuItem.name: Match Your Own Breakfast
hasMenuItem.description: Mix and match breakfast options: savory chicken bombs, fruit-laden French toast, classic smokie, ham with scrambled eggs, or waffles. Includes toast, eggs, and hash browns variations.

hasMenuItem.name: Garlic Cheese Chicken BOMBs
hasMenuItem.description: 6 pieces of hand breaded chicken piece topped with house mixed garlic cheese sauces.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken BOMBS Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken Bombs Combo: Choose between 6 or 10 chicken bombs, flavored with garlic cheese, sweet chili BBQ, maple ranch, sriracha mayo, or plain. Served with a choice of waffle fries, hashbrowns, curly fries, onion rings, french fries, mozza sticks (4pcs), waffle (2pcs), mac n cheese, tater tots, or diced potatoes. Accompanied by a selection from Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, Root Beer, various lemonades including original, strawberry, mango, guava, pineapple, floats, guava pop, mango pop, pineapple pop, Coke Zero, or Nestea.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken N Waffle Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken and waffle served with a choice of one side: waffle fries, hashbrowns, curly fries, onion rings, and more. Drink options include various sodas, lemonades, floats, and pops. Chicken bombs available in flavors like garlic cheese, sweet chili BBQ, maple ranch, sriracha mayo, and plain.

hasMenuItem.name: Ring Bird Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Ring Bird Combo: Choice of poultry served with 10 side options including fries varieties, mozza sticks, waffle, and more. Drink selections span sodas, lemonades, floats, and tropical pops.

hasMenuItem.name: Buldak Bird Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy buldak served with choice of 10 sides including waffle fries, mozza sticks, and mac n' cheese. Selection of 17 drinks like lemonades, floats, and pops.

hasMenuItem.name: Waffles & Smokie Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Waffles & smokie combo served with a choice of side: waffle fries, hashbrowns, curly fries, onion rings, french fries, mozza sticks, extra waffles, mac n cheese, tater tots, or diced potatoes. Choose a drink: soda options, lemonade varieties, floats, tropical pops, coke zero, or nestea.

hasMenuItem.name: Bulgogi Bird Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Bulgogi-seasoned chicken, choice of side: variety of fries, onion rings, mozza sticks, waffle, or mac n cheese. Drink options include assorted soda, lemonade flavors, and floats.

hasMenuItem.name: OG Bird Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Og bird combo, choice of waffle fries, hashbrowns, or other sides. Select from a range of sodas, lemonades, or floats for drinks.

hasMenuItem.name: Naked Bird Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Naked Bird Combo: Choose from classic and twisted sides such as waffle fries, hashbrowns, mozza sticks, or mac n' cheese. Beverage selection includes sodas, lemonades, floats, and tropical pops.

hasMenuItem.name: Yard Bird Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Poultry-centric combo featuring a choice of side: fries (waffle, curly, French), hashbrowns, onion rings, mozza sticks, waffle, mac n cheese, tater tots, or diced potatoes. Selection of drinks including cola varieties, sprite, root beer, assorted lemonades, floats, and tropical pops.

review.reviewBody: soo yummy and delish! the waffle was perfect, soft, and not soggy at all. the sliced bananas and strawberries added the perfect fruity taste to the sweet chocolate and whipped cream toppings. definitely satisfied my sweet tooth cravings, 11/10 would get again!
Delicious. Theres banana,stra and nutella. Will definitely order again
Love the food, the presentation and the way they accommodate, if one request changes or adaption because of food allergies!! The crew behind the scenes are friendly and so helpful!

Ring Bird Combo is such a hidden gem! 
BEST chicken sandwich in Van. GREAT size and SO tasy!!!!!
Chicken and waffles were tasty! Good portions. Very fairly priced.
